post:
Hi,

We're providing free virtual servers at http://www.virtualvm.com/.

There are no requirements.  Feel free to provide feedback so we can adjust the service as needed. :)

Free VPS Specs:
RAM: 128/512 vSwap, Disk: 4GB, IPs: 1
CPU Speed: ~400Mhz, CPU Cores: 1x
Network Speed per host: ~8Mbps
Virtualization: OpenVZ
USA, West Coast, 1Gbps.

Cheers,
VVM
